cleaned_text: The Affiliated Hospital of Gansu University of Chinese Medicine The Affiliated Hospital of Gansu University of Chinese Medicine [Photo/zyxyfy.com] The Affiliated Hospital of Gansu University of Chinese Medicine was founded in 1991. It is a 3A-grade Chinese medicine hospital integrating treatment, teaching, scientific research, healthcare, rehabilitation and first aid. The hospital offers 660 patient beds, with 30 clinical departments including internal medicine, surgery, gynecology and pediatrics, 11 medical technical departments and 36 special disease clinics. The acupuncture and moxibustion departments, along with the clinical department of integrated traditional Chinese and Western medicine, are key disciplines under the State Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine of China. Among the hospital's staff members are two provincial outstanding experts, eight doctoral supervisors, 46 master's student supervisors, five provincial key discipline leaders, 21 national famous Chinese medicine doctors and provincial famous Chinese medicine doctors. The hospital is also equipped with many large pieces of high-tech equipment and pharmaceutical laboratories that meet national standards. It has established cooperative relations with Ukraine State Medical University and Russia State Medical University, and has had exchanges with South Korea, Denmark, Hungary, Sweden, the United States, Japan and other countries in the promotion and utilization of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
